text: Aleksandar "Sanja" Ilić (; 27 March 1951 – 7 March 2021) was a Serbian composer and keyboardist. He founded the group Balkanika in 1998. He represented Serbia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal, with the song "Nova deca". Ilić died on 7 March 2021 in Belgrade from problems caused by COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Serbia, aged 69. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian composers Category:Folk musicians Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Musicians from Belgrade Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgrade
title: Sanja Ilić
